purpose_booking: To confirm, modify or delete entries.
purpose_improvement: Analyzing customer preferences and improving the quality of our services.
purpose_marketing: To send information about special offers and promotions (only with your consent).
right_correction: Right to rectification of incorrect data
right_deletion: The right to erase your data
right_unsubscribe: Right to Opt Out of Marketing Communications
section_1_content: M Le Diamant respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.
section_4_content: We use modern encryption and security technologies to protect your personal data from unauthorized access.
title: Privacy policy
